Sentencas: In the present investigation, the effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics useful as solid electrolytes in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) has been studied.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The co-doped ceria Ce-0.8 Pr0.2-xLaxO2-delta samples have been prepared successfully via sol-gel auto-combustion synthesis.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The high dense ceramic samples have been achieved by carry out an optimized conventional sintering at 1300 degrees C for 4 h. The powder X-ray diffraction analysis of all the co-doped ceria ceramics revealed the single phase with cubic-fluorite structure formation.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Crystallographic information has been carried out from the powder X-ray diffraction and Rietveld refinement analysis.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The scanning electron microscope and energy dispersive spectroscopy analysis revealed the smaller grain size with high density in microstructure and stoichiometric elemental confirmations.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Raman spectra of prepared ceramics revealed the information of phase and oxygen vacancy formation in the entire compositions.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The dilatometric studies of prepared co-doped ceria ceramics revealed the moderate coefficients of thermal expansion.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: The electrical parameters such as total conductivities and activation energies have been studied with the help of impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications

Sentencas: Among all these co-doped ceria ceramic samples, Ce0.8Pr0.10La0.10 O2-delta found to exhibit the highest value of total ionic conductivity with minimum activation energy and this makes it could be a promising electrolyte material for IT-SOFC applications.
Titulo: Effect of La3+ and Pr3+ co-doping on structural, thermal and electrical properties of ceria ceramics as solid electrolytes for IT-SOFC applications
